Class TcpAgentAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.tcp.TcpAgentAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TcpAgentListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class TcpAgentAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TcpAgentListener
    Empty implementations of the TcpAgentListener interface. Keep in mind, that the order of the callback calls is not previsible.

      • notifyAgentConnection

        public void notifyAgentConnection(java.lang.String agentName,

        Fired when a new agent in the same session connects or an already connected agent disconnects.
        Specified by:
        notifyAgentConnection in interface TcpAgentListener
        Parameters:
        agentName - the nickname of the agent that connects or disconnects
